ns2:p.#text: The organization protects power equipment and power cabling for the information system from damage and destruction.

This control, to include any enhancements specified, may be satisfied by similar requirements fulfilled by another organizational entity other than the information security program. Organizations avoid duplicating actions already covered.
The organization employs redundant and parallel power cabling paths.

ns2:p.ns2:em: Assignment: organization-defined list of critical information system components
ns2:p.#text: The organization employs automatic voltage controls for [].
